exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R n : nat Unable to unify "match (fix pairmap (x : R) (s : seq R) {struct s} : seq Rbar := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => Inf_fct f x y :: pairmap y s' end) 0 (unif_part a b n) with | [::] => [::] | _ :: s' => s' end" with "unzip2 (SF_t (SF_seq_f2 (Inf_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R
n: nat

Goal:
SF_ly (SF_inf_seq f a b n) = behead (pairmap (Inf_fct f) 0 (unif_part a b n))

Premises:
pairmap = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) => fix pairmap (x : T1) (s : seq T1) {struct s} : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => f x y :: pairmap y s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T1 -> T2) -> T1 -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments T1, T2 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_ly = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => unzip2 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
behead = fun (T : Type) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => [::] | _ :: s' => s' end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
unif_part = fun (a b : R) (n : nat) => mkseq (fun i : nat => a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (S (S n)) : R -> R -> nat -> seq R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
Inf_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
SF_inf_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Inf_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
SF_sup_ly : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_ly (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = behead (pairmap (Sup_fct f) 0 (unif_part a b n))
SF_inf_lx : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_lx (SF_inf_seq f a b n) = unif_part a b n
unif_part_nat : forall (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R), a <= x <= b -> {i : nat | nth 0 (unif_part a b n) i <= x < nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size (unif_part a b n))%nat} + {nth 0 (unif_part a b n) n <= x <= nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S n)}
SF_ly_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = behead (pairmap f2 0 P) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Inf_fct_le : forall (f : R -> R) (a b x : R), Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> Rbar_le (Inf_fct f a b) (f x)
Inf_fct_min : forall (f : R -> R) (a b m : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> m <= f x) -> is_finite (Inf_fct f a b)
SF_sup_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_val_ly = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) => behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => f ((x + y) / 2)) 0 (unif_part a b n)) : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_sup_lx : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_lx (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = unif_part a b n
unif_part_sort : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)
Inf_fct_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Inf_fct f a b = Inf_fct f b a
last_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), last x0 (unif_part a b n) = b
head_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), head x0 (unif_part a b n) = a
unif_part_bound : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b n = rev (unif_part b a n)
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
SF_map_ly : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_map f0 s) = [seq f0 i | i <- SF_ly s] where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_val_fun = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => SF_fun_f2 (fun x0 y : R => f ((x0 + y) / 2)) (unif_part a b n) x : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
SF_ly_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_ly s = SF_ly s0 where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
unzip2_behead : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip2 (behead s) = behead (unzip2 s) where ?S : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
unzip1_behead : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (behead s) = behead (unzip1 s) where ?S : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
SF_ly_nil : forall x0 : R, SF_ly (SF_nil x0) = [::] where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_ly_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_cons h s) = snd h :: SF_ly s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
behead_rev : forall s : seq ?T, behead (rev s) = rev (belast s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_ly_rev : forall s : SF_seq, SF_ly (SF_rev s) = rev (SF_ly s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
behead_rcons : forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), (0 < size s)%nat -> behead (rcons s t) = rcons (behead s) t where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_ly_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * ?T), SF_ly (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_ly s) (snd h) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_ly_f1 : forall (f1 : R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_ly (SF_seq_f1 f1 P) = belast [seq f1 i | i <- P] where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
unif_part_S : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b (S n) = a :: unif_part ((a * INR (S n) + b) / INR (S (S n))) b n
SF_val_fun_rw : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) (Hx : a <= x <= b), SF_val_fun f a b n x = match unif_part_nat a b n x Hx with | inleft H => f (a + (INR (proj1_sig H) + / 2) * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) | inright _ => f (a + (INR n + / 2) * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) end
SF_seq_bij_ly : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T) (Hs : size lx = S (size ly)), SF_ly (SF_make lx ly Hs) = ly where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_map_cons : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_map f0 (SF_cons h s) = SF_cons (fst h, f0 (snd h)) (SF_map f0 s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
SF_lx_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (0 < size P)%nat -> SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = P where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_make : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_rev_0 : forall s : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s))) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P s -> P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
is_true = fun b : bool => b = true : bool -> Prop Argument scope is [bool_scope] is_true is a coercion
behead_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), behead [seq f i | i <- s] = [seq f i | i <- behead s]
is_glb_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => is_lb_Rbar E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le b l) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
